Smart Power Strip with AI-Powered Energy Management: Create a power strip that is equipped with AI technology to monitor and manage the energy consumption of connected devices. The power strip can learn the usage patterns of devices and adjust the power supply accordingly, ensuring optimal energy efficiency.

Power Strip with Built-in USB Charging Ports: Design a power strip with multiple USB charging ports, allowing users to charge their devices simultaneously while keeping the power strip organized and out of the way. The power strip can also have a built-in surge protector and voltage regulator for added safety.

Motion-Sensing Power Strip with Automatic Turn-On/Off: Create a power strip that can detect motion and automatically turn on or off based on the presence or absence of people in the room. This feature can help save energy by reducing standby power consumption when no one is in the room.

Power Strip with Built-in Power Bank: Design a power strip with a built-in power bank that can charge devices on the go. The power bank can be recharged using a USB port, and the power strip can have multiple USB charging ports for charging multiple devices at once.

Customizable Power Strip with Personalized Settings: Create a power strip that allows users to customize their energy usage settings based on their preferences. The power strip can have a user-friendly interface that allows users to set their preferred power levels for each device, and the strip can automatically adjust the power supply based on the user's settings.
